name: Proyecto Caronte
description:
It is the year 2121, after suffering a crisis for having extinguished the natural resources of the Earth, humanity was forced to go out into space in search of solutions. For this, the Space Center for Radical Environmental Solutions (CESAR) was created, which is in charge of training astronauts whose objective is the collection of resources in other celestial bodies.

Credits: 

Game Designer:  Gandolfo Diego.

Programming:  Galvan Jessica, Rivas Franco.

Audio:  Rivas Franco.

Art:  Huergo Facundo.
